sections.heading: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using rSearch, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. Our search service provides access to various types of information through web, academic, and specialized searches.

sections.heading: 2. Service Description
sections.content: rSearch is a knowledge discovery platform that aggregates and analyzes information from multiple sources. We use advanced AI to help users find, understand, and utilize information effectively.

sections.heading: 3. User Responsibilities
sections.content: Users agree to use the service responsibly, not to automate queries without permission, and to respect intellectual property rights of content discovered through our service.

sections.heading: 4. Data Usage
sections.content: We process search queries to provide results and improve our service. Your usage helps us enhance search accuracy and relevance while maintaining privacy standards.

sections.heading: Data Collection
sections.content: We collect search queries, interaction patterns, and optional account information to provide and improve our service. We do not sell personal data to third parties.

sections.heading: How We Use Your Data
sections.content: Your data helps us improve search results, develop new features, and maintain service quality. We use aggregated, anonymized data for research and analysis.

sections.heading: Data Protection
sections.content: We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your data. All searches are encrypted, and we regularly audit our security practices.

sections.heading: Your Rights
sections.content: You can request your data, opt out of data collection beyond essential functions, and delete your account data at any time.

sections.heading: Our Mission
sections.content: rSearch aims to make knowledge discovery effortless and intelligent. We combine advanced search technology with AI to help you find exactly what you're looking for.

sections.heading: How It Works
sections.content: Our platform aggregates information from multiple sources and uses AI to understand context, analyze content, and present the most relevant results for your queries.

sections.heading: Features
sections.content: From academic research to patent searches, rSearch offers specialized search modes to help you discover knowledge across different domains. Our AI assists in summarizing and analyzing results for better understanding.

sections.heading: Technology
sections.content: Built with cutting-edge technology, rSearch uses advanced language models, semantic search, and machine learning to provide intelligent search capabilities.
